website_summaries.verdict: The Beyerdynamic Custom One Pro delivers an adjustable sound signature that ranges from flat to big bass, but always sounds clear and powerful.
pros: Powerful, accurate, and clean audio performance, with four listening modes ranging from near-flat response to heavily boosted bass
Comfortable fit good for long listening sessions
Distortion-free audio ideal for professional use
cons: No inline remote or microphone for mobile devices

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Versatile Headphones! [Video Review]
customer_reviews.text: This is my video review from the MKBHD YouTube Channel. The price/performance ratio is pretty sweet with this pair of cans. The removable audio cable is a nice touch, and the customization options available are awesome. But the killer feature is the adjustable bass port, and that's what really makes these stand out. Worth checking out, for sure! Enjoy the video! PS - You should totally subscribe to the MKBHD YouTube channel ;)
customer_reviews.author: MKBHD

customer_reviews.title: If you want base then buy these headphones already
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are probably the best headphones I've ever bought. With the adjustable base ports, you can quickly adjust how much base you want to tailor to the type of audio you're listening to. The amazing thing is, because its opening physical air ports, the base doesn't sound muddy or distorted as you increase it, it just gets louder, all the way open will produce head-rattling base. The only downside to these headphones is that they have a lot of clamping pressure, even with stretching them out and adjusting the sliders. Tragically, I ended up selling these to a friend because I get headaches from the external pressure, so keep that in mind if you also have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Failed after light use over 3 year period
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years of light use (used while working on computer and that is only a few hours a day when used), audio to right side of headphone has gone out. For the cost, would not have expected this. For this reason I do not recommend purchasing this headphone nor would purchase this brand based on this experience.
customer_reviews.author: james Wasnick

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing!!!! Beautiful full and clear sound! The option to increase the bass is the reason I decided on this pair of Beyerdynamics after deciding I wanted this brand and it was a great decision. I am a drum student and the increased bass settings help to hear what is going on in a song with the drums. The clarity and setting options have me spoiled and I'm loving it! I'm hearing things in songs that I've listened to for years that I hadn't heard before. Would have never guessed that I could have become more excited about music then I was before these headphones, but that's exactly what happened!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: I heard divine sounds!
customer_reviews.text: The headphone is a very good investment I made to enlighten my ears of the divine music :-) I am very satisfied with the sounds, options, customization, and the quality of the headphone. The box is lovely. I am glad that this headphone comes with two plugs to listen mobile devices and from sound machines. Not many headphones do that. I strongly recommend people to buy this headphone as a middle ground between lousy & "mass production" headphones like Druz and a professional studio headphone that you have to sell soul for money to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rodman Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones, Bad Cable
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very nice and the construction is good. I would give these headphones 5 stars if it weren't for the fact that the cord broke after not too long and a replacement cord from Beyerdynamic is fairly expensive. I bought this cord from 9to5Cables instead -  - and it worked out very well. You have to remove the casing (it just threads off) on the end of the cord to get it to work with what Beyerdynamic tried to make as a proprietary fitting at the headphones, forcing you to buy their more expensive cable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blain

customer_reviews.title: God tier
customer_reviews.text: If the bravest soul dared to ask me what pair of headphones, if only one pair could be selected, that I would take to mars, I would answer him with a link to these masterpieces. The beyerdynamic pro is the absolute god tier of all headphones. It doesn't mess with those m50x's that all of the Starbucks sipping iPhone users have. These are built in a German factory with the utmost respect to the materials used. If you do not buy these you will forever wonder what they sound like.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Fine headphones
customer_reviews.text: I knew as soon as I heard the first few notes of the first tune that these headphones were keepers. To be honest, there's absolutely nothing to criticize about them. Sonic quality is top notch on all bass settings, using the slider switch. They are well-built, comfortable on the head, and my ears have not become hot after prolonged headphone use. They are made in Germany, not China, the latter being the origin of stink bugs and most consumer electronics. Music sounds great, and these headphones add a sense of immediacy to the spoken word (audiobooks). I really have enjoyed them so far. My search is over.
customer_reviews.author: Driver Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, thumping bass, best sound for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for over a year and a half now and absolutely no complaints at all. I use this with my Creative SoundBlaster ZX soundcard and they sound amazing when amplified. I keep the bass slider on the second notch and it's a very balanced sound. If you're looking for a decent set of cans that'll blow Beats out of the water and won't break the bank, buy these! 5 out of 5!
customer_reviews.author: Whiteshadow001

customer_reviews.title: Passionate sound
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones with my 1st generation iPad mini for movies and music ranging from Maria Callas to Jimi Hendrix to Vangelis, from Iris DeMent to Mehdi Hassan and beyond. They are well designed and built, look great and are comfortable to wear, they cut down tremendously on sound from the outside and above all they give me beautiful, rich, clear, deep, well-balanced, passionate sound. And the adjustable bass ports? Mmmm, very nice!
customer_reviews.author: siafu

customer_reviews.title: One great headphone to match to your musics
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how they did it but it is great to trim the frequency response to match the music. It is light and comfortable over the ear. The sound is almost perfect for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chas-M15

customer_reviews.title: If you like bass and treble they will do the job
customer_reviews.text: "Tin can" sounding... I dunno they are okay. If you like bass and treble they will do the job. Don't expect much from the mid range.
customer_reviews.author: FishCommander

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall though
customer_reviews.text: The right speaker blew 9 months in. I know there's a two year warranty and I can still get a new pair under it, but I'm procrastinating. Great product overall though. It easily took over 2,000 hours of heavy use (gaming, electronic music, netflix). You can't tell the right speaker is blown unless it's a certain frequency of bass. The left speaker is still good.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: These phones sound pretty good but the unique thing about them is the ability to close the bass ports. This is very useful for working (I am a sound recordist) outdoors when there is a breeze. They are bulky and they are not noise reduction headphones as suggested in the description but they work well in wind. If you've worked with Sony 7506's in wind you know how hopeless those are.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Barker

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars except for how the cable connects ...
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars except for how the cable connects. Should just be a standard connector, has some plastic clip/lip to hold it in place on one end and you have to be really careful plugging it in or it gets damaged and then you have to buy another cable.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian

customer_reviews.title: The left headphone stopped working about 4 months after purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: The left headphone stopped working about 4 months after purchase. I keep them on my desk, there was no damage or rough handling. Hugely let down. Will not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan  Vora

customer_reviews.title: Burn in not necessary
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I was tired of the soar ears after long listening sessions. They do prevent that from happening. I ended up purchasing the Mic attachment and a splitter for my iPhone. Worked ok but on some calls there is an echo to others on the call. Could be I need to turn the volume down. Overall they are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: NonStopEMD

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a sound engineer for over 25 years, so I'm picky with my headphones. I just love the sound of these Custom Pro. The highs and high-mids are never harsh, yet the sound is as crisp and clear. And the bass is big warm yet punchy. And with the variable bass switches you can set it to the amount of bass that makes you happy. Durable like a classic BeyerDynamic headset. I've owned a pair of Beyer DT-150 headphones for over a decade and they still sound great, but these Custom Pro are my new favorites.
customer_reviews.author: MarceloA

customer_reviews.title: The best (fun) headphone you can buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before auditioning it at the local store and trusted the good reviews for a great purchase. And I must say it has not let me down a beat. Mids are slightly recessed but the smooth treble and the deep detailed bass makes up for an enjoyable music experience. The plush headband and earcups provides comfort for long sessions of music listening (or gaming). If you are shopping around for a budget headset, go ahead and grab these. They easily compete with most headsets twice the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but too tight for a big head like mine
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sounded great and the ability to adjust the sound with the ports was impressive. That being said, the tightness of these headphones squeezed my head until I got pretty good headaches. If you have a normal sized head, these are great. In the end, I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: they also do a good job in cancelling noise from outside
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband. He is very hapy with them, they also do a good job in cancelling noise from outside, Good buy! Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: wish i had purchased  2
customer_reviews.text: These are a great headset! I have played many instruments. Like working on sound with 3rd octave equalizers & PA equipment, etc. With the right equipment u can isolate any sound within the range of these killer headphones. Knowing a lot of professional songwriters & having a great ear for music these are great.....would buy them again in a heartbeat. They use my battery up when i turn it up on my nano. I love them on the laptop too. Good feel !!! Like your at a concert in front of the soundman with 100k people around you ...the bass you can almost feel like at a rock concert.
customer_reviews.author: paul doyle

customer_reviews.title: I never knew my music could sound this good. I am hearing things I have never heard ...
customer_reviews.text: I never knew my music could sound this good. I am hearing things I have never heard before in songs I have listened to for years. The ports are great for when I want a little more base. Very glad I went with these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Super Sounding - Well Made - Not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great sound - much better than most ear buds and in ear phones that I have used before. The ear cups do get very hot if it is warm. Very clean sound that gives a sense of open space rather than that overly focused sound that can happen with earphones and buds. I carry them with me in my pack and use them for work and play.
customer_reviews.author: 1cmw1234

customer_reviews.title: Little Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: These started off well but its not been a year since the purchase and the connection between the ear cups and band have become very loose and the cord already has a short in it. We've tightened the screws some but that does nothing for how loose they are. For what you pay initially I'm not sure you should have to replace the cord after only owning for 8 months. We checked these before purchasing and thought we were making a good decision but now we're wondering if it was or not.
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, awful cable
customer_reviews.text: Really great headphones. The sound quality is excellent, easily among the best, if not the best, at this price point. Soundstage is great, as is the dynamic range. Sound is warm, but not overly so; bass is punchy. The one caveat to this is that the cable is really terrible. Great while it lasts, but breaks easily. Replaceable with the V-Moda audio only cable, which is what I'm now using, and works fine. Replace the cable, and it's an incredible sound!
customer_reviews.author: Sylva

customer_reviews.title: WOW! For this price - WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I had BD DT250 for 13 years till they literally broke apart, so this is a replacement. These work great w/o an amplifier, but sure could use some profiles or some basic EQ, 250s had "nicer" sound right out of the box. But still, with these - I am amazed at the base, and with fine tuned profile you can not beat the quality for this amount of $$$. --V.
customer_reviews.author: V. M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost cans
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a relatively inexpensive set of headphones (under $200) to use with my iPhone. Did my research and the Beyers sounded like the right choice. Very happy with them. Excellent transparency and detail in this price range. A bit of coloration in the low mid range and high end rolls off. You can control the bass response with the switches that are convenient to access while you wear them. For me, the highest setting was best but there is enough control for most low frequency tastes.
customer_reviews.author: TBone Pigz

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, solid build, bass slider is a functional and great tool, sound is crisp. Highs and lots are bright and deep, couldn't ask for more. Worth your money. I compared these to a lot of other sets and went with these with no regrets. So if you're on the fence make the plunge and buy these.
customer_reviews.author: wtpanos

customer_reviews.title: Get em!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome range, love the built in bass control, comfortable for long trips and wandering, the best cans in this price range, and can totally stand up to higher price point models. Love em! Would recommend these over b&w any day, cheaper, better sound, and way more passive noise reduction
customer_reviews.author: Craig Archuletta

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones. Not noise cancelling but fit snugly enough ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. Not noise cancelling but fit snugly enough that you can play music or whatever at a reasonable level and block out most ambient sound. I would and have recommended these to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hope

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: headphones show good detail on the top end which is what I was looking for in my home studio. Ability to adjust bass is a great feature as well, I can pull it out to just check the mid range and upper end or bring it back in to check overall levels. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: Hubby absolutely loves these...I did a great deal of research before getting these.He loves his harder rock tunes and likes the sound. As for comfort , home run.....
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte M. McClintic

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 Stars - Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: 4 / 5 stars! Great pair of headphones. Quality is nice. Sound is nice. Price is a little high, but... I feel it was fair. I like the removable plug but wish the headphone folded in some fashion for portability.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Headphones were very comfortable and the sound quality is simply outstanding. The bass was tight and the highs were crisp and clean. These headphones allow you some control to tailor the sound to your specific likes when listening to whatever kind of music that you enjoy. I would highly recommend this headphone as it exceeds my expectations as this is a well made product
customer_reviews.author: phila

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm an audiophile and no complaints at all. Amazing bass and amazing all around. I absolutely love the bass ports
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Worth my money
customer_reviews.text: I spent 163 for bose ae2 and they are great for classical and quiet listening. but these were worth the money for music i like ex: house and electronic
customer_reviews.author: newatphotography

customer_reviews.title: Beats Beats
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I'd have wanted these at the full price, but they sound great. Beat the crap out of the Beats Audio I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Chad V Molenda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bad they worked fine the first month now I can hear only left speaker, bad
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Nice Work Here
customer_reviews.text: Pretty dang good headphones, very comfy that I am actually able to listen to this while wearing my headphones!Build Quality is great, design is attractice. Quality is pretty good, but the sound is pretty far away in my opinion. People say the bass is too overwhelming, but to me it doesn't feel that way (might be a bass junky, idk). But, they really are good great quality headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Virgoven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These Headphones are awesome. The Sound is even and the bass does not drown the tunes at all. Get Velour pads (Beyerdynamic EDT770VB). They are a lot comfortable and you wont feel sweaty when you are wearing the COPs
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The port on the headphones failed after only a few months. Tested with several different AUX cables and audio sources sound was intermittent on all of them. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Palmer

customer_reviews.title: two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of head phones ever, bass is solid and deep...Looks great and very well built...will recommend to any gamer...
customer_reviews.author: NEESA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little bass heavy for my tastes, tight clamping force.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Smiskol

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable ports are a nice feature. Sound is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: The best cans i have owned
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones. would definitely recommend for "at home" use. The Built Quality (5/5) - shows as soon as you take it out of the box. Portability (3/5) - its a over the ear cans. it doesn't fold either. wouldn't recommend wearing them on the streets due to the size. Value (4/5) - i feel its a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amar

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones for the price and better than most that I have owned that cost more. If you have any doubts, put them aside.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great heaphones
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, sound and build quality is fantastic. No noise leakage which was a big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Great bass, high fidelity sound and a very comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bass, high fidelity sound and a very comfortable fit. Also ships with customisable side plates to bling out your headset with a more personalised style
customer_reviews.author: Leroy C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Better The Second Time Around!-----The first time I got these, I did not like them. HOWEVER---I decided to give these another try. First, I burned them in for 8 hours. Secondly, I found that keeping the slider switch in"the middle" gives you the best sound. The slider switch is a bit sticky. Soundwise, they have a good bass, mid and treble. Also, these cans are comfortable. Give 'em a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting phones. Look very nice. Much more than their cost. They sound like a $200 dollar set of phones. The bass control really does work. Not a gimmic. However, sound was just a little to muddled and mixed together for my tastes. If you are a Dre Beats fan, these are better for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: superb quality, good price, and I really love the bass ports - it lets you experience a song in many different ways
customer_reviews.author: Ben Baltzer

customer_reviews.title: Great soundscape
customer_reviews.text: These things sound great. They actually sound even better after a couple weeks of listening. Their soundscape opens up, and I have read that they are supposed to get even better.
customer_reviews.author: Will Webb

customer_reviews.title: German engineered, enough said!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bass, no distortion! customizable. Makes your mp3 or I pod sound as good as it can. A little bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco t.

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable!
customer_reviews.text: The Beyerdynamic Custom One Pro headphones are truly remarkable. Never have I used headphones that were able to provide such a strong low frequency response, but at the same still sound great on the high and mid range frequencies as well. You get all of this built in a strong but flexible metal construction. The headphones simply feel expensive. The 3.5mm cable included is thick and feels like a high quality cable, and comes with a 3.5mm to 6mm adapter. If you are on the fence about buying this product, don't hesitate any further. Buy these headphones. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Noble

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: the speed of translation is very fast and the product is also perfect however the price of the headphone is little be expensive so if the price become little cheaper it should be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jim Liao

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile, but have tested a variety of these headphones and these are by far the best and most comfortable headphones in the $300-400 range.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Good price range, quality, better then beats by a longshot
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because of the detatchable auxilary, also having the option to change out headband, ring and pads is pretty nice. But most importantly have a great sound after a little burn in time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipment, great product, amazing sound, thank you! All they needed was a brief break in period and they were good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Right speaker volume is significantly weaker than the left speaker.
customer_reviews.text: After 7 months of very light use at normal volume, the right speaker volume is significantly weaker than the left speaker. I asked my wife to listen, she found the same results. I tested it with other input devices and got the same result. Unfortunately, the item cannot be returned for exchange. Save your $200+ and keep shopping for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: its my first,great product,and i like it,my son take a great enjoy in it,have many likes,still in my happy hearts.
customer_reviews.author: Feng Yongqiang

customer_reviews.title: It's a great headphone !
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it is not that portable to bring around. The sound is great, cause I think I am kind of bass head.
customer_reviews.author: Jinqi Huang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: By far the best and most durable headphones I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible for the price, and so easy to drive, sound great with everything from a phone to a decent soundcard with an amp! My new favourites.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lynch

customer_reviews.title: It was described like new, but after couple days the cable started ...
customer_reviews.text: It was described like new, but after couple days the cable started popping out. The sound became not even on bought sides. When I contacted the seller he didn't resolved the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone for the price
customer_reviews.text: i bought these headphones more than a month ago some time before thanksgiving at 149. The product is tough and made in Germany, though it isn't as heavy as it looks. It feels comfortable for long time wearing. However, as portable headphones, they aren't really portable since u can not fold it or wear it on your neck-- too big. The sound is fine, and it will be better after listening for some time. I'm trying to find out it's necessary for an amplifier for them. P.S. I'm really interested in the changing price
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with product, great sounding headphones, thrilled with this set, likes I said before, so far so good, yo Vinny!
customer_reviews.author: Kuz Tomer.

customer_reviews.title: awesome set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: the head phones, once prepared properly are awesome! the ability to adjust and alter the sound is an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lope Claudio

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and sound slider!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool headphone, looks great sound even better. Two year warranty and made in Germany. Just be sure to buy from an authorized dealer.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: No more boom
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! And I love the fact that it keeps his video games silent so I can watch tv in the same room.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Yes I do like it. Great with my amplifier
customer_reviews.text: Yes I do like it. Great with my amplifier , great with my ipod, and great with my tablet also
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel K.

customer_reviews.title: Great, but the headphone cable could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: Love this earphones...except for the audio cable that does not take daily use very well. I've since had to order a better quality one. Otherwise THESE are the headphones to get if you don't want to spend $600+ on Grados.
customer_reviews.author: Dank

customer_reviews.title: Headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way these headphones feel on my head, and like them because you can change the head band colors.... They give you good sound ..... good quality headphones that have multiple functions!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R Miller

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: amazing sound for me, it is big and can not fold, think twice when you decide to travel with him however, really cool!!! very good quality!!! i have got what i paid
customer_reviews.author: Tian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Sound amazing. Only thing is you pay extra for the customization options.
customer_reviews.author: Shelton W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very solid headphones. Got it days before I expected. Sounds good for all types of music. I consider it a very neutral headphone, with not too much emphasis on bass like BEATS and not too much emphasis on high's like Sennhieser 595's.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfy with my purchase. The bass of these cans overpass my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best Things Ever
customer_reviews.text: I truly think this is for everyone no matter what type of person you are. It is made strong to last long, and this is reassuring when it comes from Germany. But anyways, buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad Madden

customer_reviews.title: better than beats
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are way better than some beats by dre and way cheaper than the beats. Very high quality headphones very good sounding headphones
customer_reviews.author: antwan l kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm no audiophile, but the various reviews over the new made me curious. I was so glad I took the plunge! I don't think Beats (which sound I am very familiar with) can do better than this. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Choo

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The detachable cable is a great feature. The headphones are large enough to fit my large head comfortably. Sound quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Turner

customer_reviews.title: Eggcellent
customer_reviews.text: The Liw end can be cut out real nicely and sound flat especially that these are headphones. Flat is what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: good sound
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, but have some dropbacks such as unreliable cable. Need to notice that option of changing bass amazing.
customer_reviews.author: dokken63

customer_reviews.title: The low rating is due to the fact that the ...
customer_reviews.text: The low rating is due to the fact that the product is unreliable. The sound comes out of only one side. Unfortunately Amazon's policy of not accepting returns after a 30-day period and not offering any sort of warranty worsens the situation and leads to a Catch-22 position. The manufacturer tells the owner that he/she shoulc contact the seller; the seller (Amazon) washes its hands of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: de Vigny

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT BUILD AND INITIONAL SOUND QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: BIG PHONES AND LIGHT AS A FEATHER WELL MADE VERY COMFORTABLE AND THEY SOUND CLEAR AS A BELL OUT OF THE BOX THOSE VERSES THE AU TEC M50'S WHO KNOWS FOR SURE OH YES THE CABLES SUPPLIED ARE OF FINE BUILD AND THICK BUT NOT IN THE WAY I LOVE THE PHONES AND WILL DECORATE THEM AS I SEE FIT LIKE THEY SAY ON THE BOX JAY PEREL
customer_reviews.author: lillian perel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching around for comfortable headphones, The most comfortable one I found were the Bose Quiet Comfort 15, however they were pricey and didn't work without a battery. These are very nice headphones for everyday use. I'm not an audiophile, so I can't comment too much on the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: sasathi

customer_reviews.title: I love this headphone
customer_reviews.text: there is no reason for loving it. You might wanna feel it. Bass control is quite awesome, so I can anticipate various genre of songs!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Kim

customer_reviews.title: Dis prime stuff right here m8
customer_reviews.text: dat bass m8 omg liek u can turn et up or duwn nd wen u turn et up is liek sex 10/10 m8
customer_reviews.author: Dojix

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Good when they arrived but the connection cord to the headphones started shorting out within a month. Very disappointed given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Faramarz Moeen

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Hey guys, I got these headphones an half hour ago(maybe to early to write a review but im positive surprised). The first thing i can say is that German Audio Engineering is by far the best! The sound quality is clear and the bass impact is brilliant(which you can change). The material of the headphones are very good maybe not the best from beyerdynamic but Beats user will love it. Forget Monster this is much better. If you buy a 1000$ T1 its nothing special that the material is better.The good thing is that these headphones contain zero marketing and the beats 75%.
customer_reviews.author: Yan1410

customer_reviews.title: These absolutely suck. If they are truely Beyer dynamic and not ...
customer_reviews.text: These absolutely suck. If they are truely Beyer dynamic and not a knockoff.. im not impressed at all. Especially for the price. I have $40 Sonys that blow these away. There is no depth to the sound no matter what setting u use.
customer_reviews.author: stellar1111

customer_reviews.title: I have one, bought in late 2013. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one, bought in late 2013. It is 2015 now, and the cable doesn't work properly. Sound only comes out from one of the cans
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wibowo

customer_reviews.title: Below Average
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing sound quality. Expected high bass outputs, but, was OK. Good design. Quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anand Balaraman

customer_reviews.title: Not an Authorized Dealer
customer_reviews.text: Another Deal Site is not an Authorized beyerdynamic Dealer and cannot support the warranty. Please be very cautious in regards to purchasing this product from this reseller.
customer_reviews.author: headphone guru 18

customer_reviews.title: not worth hype.
customer_reviews.text: mids and high are missing, who needs such expensive headphone for only lows. there is no setting on which it can come close to M50
customer_reviews.author: yougotmyworld

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace a pair of Sennheisers whose pads had worn badly and started to crack and peel. Having read the reviews on Amazon and done other research I opted for these headphones. I expected exceptional performance from them but was disappointed to get a poorly balenced soundstage and a bass that was far too dominant on even the lowest setting. I found them totally unsuited to the music I listen to - rock and acoustic. They are also extremely uncomfortable to wear with a tight fit that pinched my earlobes. I have sent them back to Amazon and ordered a trusty pair of Sennheisers instead.
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: It's really worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Custom One Pro is truly a professional headphone. I simply love it. It's very versatile and provides an excellent music experience when you're listening to your favourite ones. The massive headphones perfectly seal so they keep any disturbing noise outside. What's even better is that you don't disturb your environment as virtually no sound escapes. I like the removable parts that really give you the freedom to customise your headphones to your individual needs. GO FOR IT!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ferenc Mori

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUT CABLE GONE WIERD
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I bought these after looking at reviews on-line saying they are durable but something has happened on the inside of the cable that plugs into the headphones. I will need to buy a replacement cable however the sound quality and customisability through the look and the sound make these headphones very good. they are also extremely comfy and have some sort of noise isolation as they cover your ears completely. Overall a great pair of headphones however the cable is a bit annoying...
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy Beats, buy these.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for headphones with bass, look no further. I've tried countless pairs but these are by far my favourite. Paired with a Fiio Kilimanjaro 2 amp these handle all the bass I can throw at it without distortion. 5*
customer_reviews.author: moodculler

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, rubbish cable
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, rubbish cable. Had to send these back after 3 days due the headphone cable being faulty, loved these until they started sounding like a speaker had blown. After talking to customer services they explained this was due to the cable, had to send the whole package back instead of being sent a new cable : (
customer_reviews.author: Paul Burch

product_meta.title: Beyerdynamic Custom One Pro Black (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingCustom One Pro is just the beginning of a complete new product family from beyerdynamic "Custom Series". The first truly customizable and interactive headphone in the world. The end user can change the sound, the style and the application any time after the purchase. Custom One Pro is the first model in the series for 2012. Designed and crafted in Germany by beyerdynamic for Pro Users, Consumers and Prosumers. Use with portable and professional devices. One headphone many applications. Change the sound, the style and the look. The CUSTOM series is one-of-a-kind, as it allows you to redesign and re-engineer your headphones at any time, making them the perfect match for whatever the situation or your mood demands. This is truly a product for the new headphone 2.0 generation.
feature_bullets: Custom Sound Slider to change the sound anytime (closed, semi open, open design)
Customizable Style: easily change color of the headband, ear pads, ear cups plates design, detachable cable... Crazy or Cool … Style and look!
New Velocity Drivers at 16 ohm, suitable for smart phone, ipad, tablets, home audio or pro audio devices
Variable Noise Reduction, adjust the Sound Slider for deeper bass and block out noises, or adjust to hear just a little ouside sound, you design it!
Quality. Made in Germany. Two year warranty by beyerdynamic USA
